title: Cheese, chive and mustard scones
description: Savoury scones make a brilliant addition to a packed lunch instead of a boring sandwich. (If you can resist eating them all straight out of the oven.)
ingredients: 510g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for flouring
65g/2½oz unsalted butter, plus extra for serving
1 free-range egg, beaten with a little milk for glazing
